story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What’re you saying, Gramps?! I have
my reasons!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
There are so many strong Trainers on Pasio,
unlike any I’ve met before!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: And I don’t wanna lose to them!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: I wanna aim for the top here, too!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: That’s why I need Arceus to accept me!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
What’s so important about reaching the top?
And what do you plan to do after Arceus
accepts you?
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Lance went through so much—and
awakened his arc suit!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: His bond with Dragonite grew even stronger!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You’re the one who’s always saying we
should walk toward the future together
with Pokémon!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: I haven’t been doing it wrong, have I?
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
But Lance’s Dragonite and your Volcarona
might think differently, don’t you think?
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Volcarona feels the same way I do!
I’m not pushing him too hard!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Words alone aren’t getting my message
across...
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: All right! I’ve made up my mind!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’ll also try to awaken MY arc suit—
with Volcarona!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2300_10:
What is strength? And what does it mean to
walk toward the future together with
Pokémon?
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2400_10:
I’ll show you through actions instead
of words!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2600_10: You’re challenging me, aren’t you, Gramps.
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Let’s see who’s stronger and awakens their
arc suit first!
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Benga, the next time we meet will be at the
Arceus Cup.
story_arceus_04_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Let’s both go all out—each with our
Volcarona!
